content:
Old Town, Key West Style Events 

Our all-new indoor meeting space features 1400 square feet with floor to ceiling views of the surrounding Old Town neighborhood. With central air-conditioning, wireless internet access, and a variety of set-up and A/V options, this flexible space is conveniently located at the edge of the resort, adjacent to the Serenity Pool, in the heart of the historic Key West. Choose to have your welcome cocktail hour in our lush tropical Gardens, break-out sessions to kick back and relax in between meetings on the Harbor House veranda, or a closing dinner reception outdoors at the Serenity Pool. The Marker Waterfront Resort can provide your team with what they are looking for in a destination meeting location. The Marker Waterfront Resort meeting and event space is accessible. For more information, please view our Accessibility Statement.

With meeting room catering provided by our on-site restaurant, Cero Bodega, we’ll deliver your breakfast or lunch with a touch of Key West flair for meetings up to 100 people. Let our staff of Key West meeting planners help you plan your “meeting” in paradise!
